item.title: Yew.rs With TailwindCSS
item.description: Yew Like a lot of people, I think WASM is the future. Yew is an amazing frontend framework that helps in building web apps using WASM. It’s incredibly easy to use and the performance of the app is EXTREMELY fast! I’m currently re-writing Snowstry with yew.rs for the frontend (switching from NextJS). Here’s the repo link. Yew + Tailwind Setting up yew with tailwind was very easy as well. If you don’t know what tailwind is, here’s the link to their website.
